mapper.insert: insert into route (route_id, route_name, start_district_id, start_city_id, midpoint_district_id, midpoint_city_id, destination_district_id, destination_city_id, carriage_price, route_comment) values (#{route_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{route_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{start_district_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{start_city_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{midpoint_district_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midpoint_city_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destination_district_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destination_city_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carriage_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{route_comment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update route set route_name = #{route_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_district_id = #{start_district_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_city_id = #{start_city_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, midpoint_district_id = #{midpoint_district_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, midpoint_city_id = #{midpoint_city_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, destination_district_id = #{destination_district_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, destination_city_id = #{destination_city_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carriage_price = #{carriage_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, route_comment = #{route_comment,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where route_id = #{route_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select route_id, route_name, start_district_id, start_city_id, midpoint_district_id, midpoint_city_id, destination_district_id, destination_city_id, carriage_price, route_comment from route where route_id = #{route_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
